class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        ans = []
        path = list(range(n))
        for u,v in queries:
            i = bisect_right(path, u)
            j = bisect_left(path, v)
            path[i:j] = []
            # print(path)
            ans.append(len(path)-1)
        
        return ans
